Format.summary: Applies the format with the given values and creates a .

FormatTemp.summary: Applies the format with the given values and creates a .

TryFormat.summary: Applies the format with the given values and tries to write it to a span.
TryFormat.param: The destination span to write to.
The amount of characters written to the span.

AppendFormat.summary: Appends the format, using the given values, to the string builder.
AppendFormat.param: The builder to append the text to.

VarArgs.param: The arguments to fill the holes with.

SingleArg.param: The argument to fill the hole with.

MultiArgs.param: The first argument to fill the hole with.
The second argument to fill the hole with.
The third argument to fill the hole with.
The forth argument to fill the hole with.
MultiArgs.typeparam: The type of the first argument.
The type of the second argument.
The type of the third argument.
The type of the fourth argument.
